title: Case Overview
description: Comprehensive view of all cases with filtering, search, and bulk operations

buttons.name: New Case
buttons.purpose: Create a new case with complete initial setup
buttons.gstExample: Create new GST notice case with GSTIN, amount, and stage details

buttons.name: Search Cases
buttons.purpose: Find cases by number, client name, or keywords
buttons.gstExample: Search for 'DRC-01' or client GSTIN to find specific GST cases

buttons.name: Filter by Stage
buttons.purpose: Show cases at specific litigation stages
buttons.gstExample: Filter to show only cases at 'Adjudication' or 'First Appeal' stage

buttons.name: Filter by SLA
buttons.purpose: Focus on cases based on deadline status
buttons.gstExample: Show GST cases with Red SLA status requiring immediate attention

buttons.name: Export Cases
buttons.purpose: Download case list in various formats
buttons.gstExample: Export GST case register for client reporting or compliance

philosophy: The overview provides a command center for managing your entire case portfolio, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks
